snippet.title: Gas Station Simulator   Steam Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check Out: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1149620/Gas_Station_Simulator/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gasstationsimulator
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GasStationSim
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/GasStationSimulator/

Sit down with us today and enjoy what we have in store for you in this special occasion.
Gas Station Simulator is planned to be released on Steam on September 15th 2021!

Gas Station Simulator is a new simulation game that puts you into position of a gas station owner.
Purchase nearly disintegrated gas station and restore it back to it's original glory!

Together with gas station comes not only responsibility, but also workshop, warehouse and a car wash, all that you can repair and generate income from.
Vast variety of events occurring in the middle of the desert where your station is located is something that will keep you busy.

Hire employees, clean your station and rebuild it to look representative!
Become a business owner today, add Gas Station Simulator to your Wishlist on Steam and keep an eye out for the September 15th!
